- Diagonal Contours: line count, gap, slope angle, dual peak positions for jagged effect, skew factor, line length extension, corner style, line weight, opacity step
- Conditional UI: Line Weight only appears for Contours pattern
- Fully client-side with Next.js App Router + TypeScript
